resources.string: Describe for example the categories and prices
Write what you want everyone to see as a description
There are no publications in your city, if there are no registered courts, you can register those of your city in the court section.
There are no courts in your city, to add them, go to the court section and then add.
Fill the data and upload the image of the court to send it
The court was sent for review!
Select the image of the court
Fill in all the data to publish the training
Your IP has been blocked by the administrator for breach of the rules
Write a description and / or select a court to publish
The report was sent to the administrator!
Are you sure you want to delete the training?

Fill the fields and upload a horizontal image that does not pass 1 MB in weight, if you put the court as a private domain, it will only be visible in the courts section. After sending the court, the administrator will determine the data to later add it. If the court is accepted, the user will be notified with a notification.
Note: Keep in mind writing the state and city as it appears below your email.
After entering SportKeep through Facebook or Google you accept the terms of the following agreement.
SportKeep offers an environment that allows all its members to publish without any discrimination based on sex, age, nationality or religion
We remind you that it is expressly prohibited:
-Create multiple publications of any kind: publication, training or championship, having the same content repetitively.
-It is understood that it is expressly prohibited to insult other users or make racist comments.
- Annoy other users with repeated comments.
-Use SportKeep for commercial purposes or to advertise another company.
Regarding the items available in this app, it is expressly prohibited:
-The reproduction, even partial, of any article without written authorization from SportKeep.
-Diffuse the contents of any article. These items are for the exclusive and personal use of registered members.

In the event that any of the SporKeep administrators have reason to believe that I am in breach of the agreement, or the terms and conditions of SportKeep or any limit agreed upon for the users, I acknowledge the administrator\'s right to take the relevant measures. For example, without any restriction, the possibility of suspending the right to enter the app.
What to do in case of insults?

If you have received an insult, touch the user\'s name and a pop-up window will appear, there you will write the reason for your report. It includes details of the date, time and type of insult. We can apply the appropriate sanctions.
We want you to know that the SportKeep team will do everything possible to maintain a friendly and healthy atmosphere within the app.
By entering the application you indicate that you know and understand the following points of the privacy policy:
1 - Respect for your privacy is fully guaranteed.
2 - The developer of the App, not Google, is solely responsible for SportKeep and its content.

3 - Through this application, basic personal data such as the name, email and profile picture of the provider used for authentication are collected, these data will only be used to identify the user and will not be shared with third parties.
4 - The IP address is registered for the sole purpose of identifying and punishing those users who violate the conditions of use.
5 - Users\' email accounts are not accessed.
6 - The application does not save data or follow up on times and hours of use.
7 - The application does not save information related to your device, such as: faults, system activity, hardware settings, browser type, browser language.
8 - The application does not access your contacts or agendas.
9 - The application accesses your real location and from it shows you results, your location is not stored anywhere.
10 - The application uses an age classification: PEGI 3 - Suitable for all audiences.
11. - Maintenance and support: The developer of the App, not Google, will be obliged to provide such maintenance or support.
12 - Fees and charges: Any use of this application is completely free.
13. - Changes to our Privacy Policy: Our Privacy Policy may change from time to time.
We will post any privacy policy changes on this page, so you should check it periodically.
14 - Contact: If you have any questions about this Policy or to report any violation of the Policy, send an email to: sportkeepapp@gmail.com
